Package model

Class ServicePoint

java.lang.Object
model.ServicePoint
public class ServicePoint extends Object
The ServicePoint class represents a service point in the gas station simulation. It manages the queue of customers, handles the beginning and completion of services, and tracks the number of arrived and served customers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a ServicePoint with the specified generator, event list, and event type to be scheduled.

      Constructs a ServicePoint with the specified generator, event list, and event type to be scheduled.
      Parameters:
      generator - the generator for service times
      eventList - the event list to which events are added
      eventTypeScheduled - the event type to be scheduled

      Parameters:

    • removeQueue

      public Customer removeQueue()
      Removes and returns the next customer from the queue, and increments the count of served customers.
      Returns:
      the next customer in the queue

    • beginService

      public void beginService()
      Begins service for the next customer in the queue and schedules the next event.

    • isReserved

      public boolean isReserved()
      Checks if the service point is currently reserved.
      Returns:
